messages.subject: Do you want to "get chipped"?
messages.msgSnippet: This is an amazing example of when cyber-culture goes wrong. How long before it is applied to the enforcement of truancy laws? Implantable Chip, On Sale Now By
messages.messageBody:
This is an amazing example of when cyber-culture goes wrong. How long
before it is applied to the enforcement of truancy laws?


Implantable Chip, On Sale Now
By Julia Scheeres
http://www.wired.com/news/privacy/0,1848,55999,00.html

02:00 AM Oct. 25, 2002 PDT
"(ID chips) are a form of electronic leashes, a form of digital
control," said Marc Rotenberg, executive director of the Electronic
Privacy Information Center. "What happens if an employer makes it a
condition of employment for a person to be implanted with the chip?
It could easily become a condition of release for parolees or a
requirement for welfare."

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
